CustomField.description: Actual Days Overdue, will record a positive or negative number with (two decimal points) that records how many days the item is overdue or underdue (e.g. 1.5 days would equate to 1.5 days overdue, -2.73 would equate to nearly two and three quarters days ahead of the due date.) This will be calculated using business hours.
CustomField.label: Actual Days Overdue
